1400850.name: Aza
1400850.description:
Plot

The ultimate angel knight, Aza, is on the brink of death when her battle unexpectedly rouses Zend from his crystal slumber. His demonic energy and strength catches the eye of the demon, Zara, whose mission of consuming Aza is instantly replaced by a dangerous, unsettling interest with Zend.

Now, the reluctant protector Zend is forced to save the very angel that woke him up. As Zara unleashes her full demonic might and throws legions of creatures in your path, your only hope is to guide Aza on a desperate quest. You must fight through the chaos to retrieve the three crystalized spirit guardians to finally awaken Aza's potential and secure your escape from Zara's twisted affection.

Key Features and Gameplay

Experience this fast-paced anime saga with combat designed for high energy and visual impact:

  • Clean Action Hack 'n' Slash Gameplay: Master a system built for swift, satisfying combat against hordes of enemies and powerful bosses.

  • Explosive Fights: Engage in intense, screen-filling battles driven by demonic and divine powers clashing across stunning arenas.

  • Quick Action Events with Stunning Visuals: Witness and execute spectacular, high-stakes maneuvers during key moments that enhance the story and immersion.

  • Unleash Power Aura Skills: Utilize unique, flashy, and devastating power aura skills to clear the screen and turn the tide of battle.

  • Anime-Like Story: Dive into a narrative filled with dramatic turns, reluctant heroes, obsessive villains, and the desolate loneliness of the ultimate angel princess knight.
1400850.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
